select count(c.id) from ( select staff.id from (
(select DATE_FORMAT(adddate(s.create_time, numlist.id),'%Y-%m') as time ,s.id from (SELECT n1.i + n10.i*10 + n100.i*100 AS id FROM num n1 cross join num as n10 cross join num as n100 ) as numlist , shengxian_staff s where adddate( s.create_time , numlist.id) <= CURDATE() and s.id = #{staff_id} ) ) staff
left join ( select sum(a.count)count , a.price ,a.`month` from ( (select DATE_FORMAT(o.audit_time,'%Y-%m') as month,sum(o.price)price ,count(o.id)count from shengxian_order o where o.is_del=0 and o.status = 4 and o.staff_id = #{staff_id} group by month order by month desc)

group by staff.time order by staff.time desc )c
